Cursed Run.NAME: En forbannet oppstigning
Cursed Run.DESCRIPTION: Hver gang du slår en høvding får du et Forbannelseskort. Startrelikvien din blir erstattet med Forbannelsens nøkkel, Et smykke av mørkestein, og Du-Vu-dukke

Elite Swarm.NAME: Storviltjeger
Elite Swarm.DESCRIPTION: Elitefiender svermer rundt i tårnet, og etterlater seg bedre belønninger.

Night Terrors.NAME: Fryktens natt
Night Terrors.DESCRIPTION: Hvis du hviler ved Leirbål, helbreder du 100% av max HP, men mister 5 Max HP i prosessen.

Diverse.NAME: Variabel
Diverse.DESCRIPTION: Start med 2 tilfeldige kort fra en annen figurklasse.

Vintage.NAME: Gammeldags
Vintage.DESCRIPTION: Normale fiender etterlater seg Relikvier isteden for kort.

Midas.NAME: Midas
Midas.DESCRIPTION: Fiender slipper 200% mer gull, men du kan ikke oppgradere kort ved Leirbål.

Insanity.NAME: Galskap
Insanity.DESCRIPTION: Start med en tilfeldig kortstokk med 50 kort.

Lethality.NAME: Dødelighet
Lethality.DESCRIPTION: Du starter alle kamper med +3 i Styrke. Alle fiender starter også kampene med +3 i Styrke.

Terminal.NAME: Den aller siste
Terminal.DESCRIPTION: Hver gang du entrer et nytt rom mister du 1 i Max HP. Du starter alle kamper med 5 Jernrustning.

Hoarder.NAME: Hoarder
Hoarder.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you add a card to your deck, add two additional copies. You can no longer remove cards from your deck at the Merchant.

Draft.NAME: Draft
Draft.DESCRIPTION: Draft a custom starting deck of cards.

Brewmaster.NAME: Brewmaster
Brewmaster.DESCRIPTION: Start with 5 copies of Alchemize, Toy Ornithopter and White Beast Statue.

Specialized.NAME: Specialized
Specialized.DESCRIPTION: Start with 5 copies of a single rare card.

Endless.NAME: Endless
Endless.DESCRIPTION: Winning will return you to Act 1 with the same deck. But beware, the blight eventually consumes all...

One Hit Wonder.NAME: One Hit Wonder
One Hit Wonder.DESCRIPTION: Start the game with 1 max HP.

Starter Deck.NAME: Starter Deck
Starter Deck.DESCRIPTION: Start with Busted Crown and Binary, so enemies no longer drop cards.

Praise Snecko.NAME: Praise Snecko
Praise Snecko.DESCRIPTION: Replaces your starting relic with Snecko Eye.

Inception.NAME: Inception
Inception.DESCRIPTION: Replaces your starting relic with Unceasing Top.

My True Form.NAME: My True Form
My True Form.DESCRIPTION: Start with a copy of Demon Form, Wraith Form and Echo Form.

Blight Chests.NAME: Blight Chests
Blight Chests.DESCRIPTION: Boss chests contain blights after beating Act 3 on Endless.

Stunted Growth.NAME: Stunted Growth
Stunted Growth.DESCRIPTION: Enemies no longer drop card rewards after beating Act 3 on Endless.

Blue Cards.NAME: Blue Cards
Blue Cards.DESCRIPTION: Blue cards now appear in rewards and shops.

Red Cards.NAME: Red Cards
Red Cards.DESCRIPTION: Red cards now appear in rewards and shops.

Green Cards.NAME: Green Cards
Green Cards.DESCRIPTION: Green cards now appear in rewards and shops.

SealedDeck.NAME: Sealed Deck
SealedDeck.DESCRIPTION: Craft a deck from 30 random cards.

IntelligentEnemies.NAME: Intelligent Enemies
IntelligentEnemies.DESCRIPTION: All enemies have more challenging movesets and abilities.

MonsterHunter.NAME: Monster Hunter
MonsterHunter.DESCRIPTION: Enemies have bonus HP but drop better rewards.

NeowTime.NAME: Neow Time
NeowTime.DESCRIPTION: Receive 3 blessings and 1 blight from Neow.

Flight.NAME: Flight
Flight.DESCRIPTION: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to.

ControlledChaos.NAME: Controlled Chaos
ControlledChaos.DESCRIPTION: Start with Frozen Eye. At the start of your turn add 10 random cards to the bottom of your draw pile.

Careless.NAME: Careless
Careless.DESCRIPTION: At the start of every turn, discard the top card of your draw pile.

Chimera.NAME: Chimera
Chimera.DESCRIPTION: Your starting deck is a fusion of 3 characters.

DeadlyEvents.NAME: Deadly Events
DeadlyEvents.DESCRIPTION: ? rooms can now contain Elites but are more likely to contain Treasure rooms.

Daily Mods.NAME: Daily Mods
Daily Mods.DESCRIPTION: Embark on a run with exactly 3 random Daily Mods.

Purple Cards.NAME: Purple Cards
Purple Cards.DESCRIPTION: Purple cards now appear in rewards and shops.
